Sponsor Drupalcamp Chicago

Sponsors provide necessary support for Chicago's greater Drupal community to meet and learn from each other at a DrupalCamp. These events happen all over the world and are important to the continued advancement and enthusiasm of the open source community.

Why Sponsor?

Our sponsors really help make it all happen. Your financial backing allows DrupalCamp Chicago to happen at a low cost to its attendees, which broadens the scope of who can attend such an event. Plus support open source tools you love.

What are Benefits?

You support us, we support you. Attendees will know who stepped up to help make this event a reality. We do our best to make sure the community knows you gave back. Contact us with any questions and review our sponsor packages below.

Gold: $1500 (SOLDOUT!)

  • Room named after your organization
  • Logo on site, promotional materials, and @event
  • Sponsor badge for your site
  • Mentioned on Twitter and during event
  • Sponsor table
  • 5 attendee slots

Silver: $1000 (5 available)

  • Logo on site and promotional materials, and @event
  • Sponsor badge for your site
  • Mentioned on Twitter and during the event
  • Sponsor Table
  • 3 attendee slots

Bronze: $500 (unlimited)

  • Logo on site
  • Sponsor badge for your site
  • Mentioned on Twitter and during the event
  • 2 attendee slots

Community: $100 (unlimited)

  • Individual and freelance sponsorship
  • Logo on site
  • Sponsor badge for your site
  • Register 1 attendee normal, pay a lil extra
